fields.name: Kind
fields.description: The kind of the event source.

fields.name: LocalTimestamp
fields.description: An object that represents the local timestamp property. It contains the format of local timestamp that needs to be used and the corresponding timezone offset information. If a value isn't specified for localTimestamp, or if null, then the local timestamp will not be ingressed with the events.

fields.name: Tags
fields.description: Key-value pairs of additional properties for the resource.
